column4: i am repeating my question, i have a sound problem with my dell laptop. anybody can help me please
i am using ubuntu10, my system is dell inspiron. head phones are working but speakers are not working
ok. Yesterday, when I compiled alsa driver on his laptop, there was this same issue. No sound from speakers... actually, after the install, alsa has volumes muted by default
By his, I mean my friend's aptop
few days before speakers are working. but  from last fifteen days i have been suffering
Just install alsamixergui... and adjust the speaker volume
i installed and adjusted. but no sound coming
click on the top buttons above bars of speakers....
run $alsamixer... in terminal.. Are you having ZERo bars for SPEAKERS
i checked that also. master, pcm are in 100
what about speaker section.. there is a seperate section for speaker
there is no separate section for speakers. those are inbuilt speakers
